'''Anthon''' is one of [[Tartaglia]]'s younger siblings, alongside [[Tonia]] and [[Teucer]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Defender of Childhood Dreams}}</ref>

==Profile==
Anthon is the second-youngest child in his family, only being older than Teucer. He believed that the people of [[Liyue]] were made of stone; after being stationed there, Tartaglia writes to Tonia to "please break it to Anthon that the residents of Liyue are just boring old ordinary humans, like us."<ref name="Tartaglia CS">{{Ref/CS|Tartaglia|Tartaglia's Letters to Home}}</ref> In addition to that, it is implied he belived the Liyue people ate stones as well, with Tartaglia saying in his letter, "They not made of stone, and they don't even eat stones."<ref name="Tartaglia CS" />

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Anthon and Tonia are both names derived from {{w|Anthony}}, itself derived from the surname ''Antony'' which is said to have been named after the descendants of Anton, a son of {{w|Heracles}}.
